notes: This roadmap represents ALL work done in fred139-project from inception (Oct 2025) to present (Nov 2025)
Includes completed CI/CD pipeline fixes, auto-save system, cross-PC sync, and MCP integrations
Sales Dashboard is separate Google Sheets project that needs consolidation into main repo
SEO Strategy work from other Claude chat session is captured but implementation is future work
GitKraken integration is planned but not yet implemented
Auto-save system is COMPLETE and running - zero manual intervention required
Repository consolidation COMPLETE - GitLab fully eliminated, single source of truth established
